p: We used SAS to filter, link and extract data from the MOHLTC administrative databases available to us, and R (version 3.5.3) for all analyses. R packages glmmTMB (version 0.2.3, [ 9]) and depmixS4 (version 1.3-5, [ 10]) were used to fit Gamma and finite mixture Poisson distributions to the delay distributions (see Additional fileÂ 1).
